history.proof: intros a b H1 H2. srun best use: Z.mul_lt_mono_nonneg, Z.ge_le.

exceptions.exn: In environment a, b : Z H1 : a >= 0 H2 : a < b Unable to unify "(?M1837 / ?M1838 ?= 0) = Lt -> False" with "(a * a ?= b * b) = Lt".
In environment a, b : Z H1 : a >= 0 H2 : a < b Unable to unify "(?M1837 / ?M1838 ?= ?M1837) = Lt" with "(a * a ?= b * b) = Lt".

original: intros a b H1 H2. apply Z.mul_lt_mono_pos_l. - apply Z_div_ge0; auto. - apply Z_div_lt; auto.
